t: Naterra - Wikipedia
s: May 9, 2024 - Naterra International, Inc., is a privately held based consumer products sales and marketing company based in Coppell, Texas. Naterra manages several brands, including Baby Magic and Tree Hut. Mr. Jon Song is CEO.
